scripts.say: Losing a battle will result in your ships losing both HP and Resolve. If you lose several battles, they’ll be too fatigued and won’t be able to win against the boss.
You can order your ships to regroup and rest. This will repair the damage they’ve sustained, and restore their Resolve.
You can restore your ships’ HP by docking them at a port, changing your fleet composition, using certain items, or issuing a regroup and rest order.
